body_html:
A small update here: I've managed to reproduce the failures, but I'll have to rely on people more experienced in Eigen/CUDA/MSVC to figure out why this op is being compiled to incorrect code on Windows.

In the mean time, I've sent out #6822, which disables the broken GPU kernels for tf.one_hot() (and some tf.matrix_diag() and tf.matrix_diag_part(), which seem to have the same failure mode, and both also use the generator interface), while we work on a fix.

body:
A small update here: I've managed to reproduce the failures, but I'll have to rely on people more experienced in Eigen/CUDA/MSVC to figure out why this op is being compiled to incorrect code on Windows.

In the mean time, I've sent out #6822, which disables the broken GPU kernels for `tf.one_hot()` (and some `tf.matrix_diag()` and `tf.matrix_diag_part()`, which seem to have the same failure mode, and both also use the generator interface), while we work on a fix.
